name: Modules.SafariDialog.AuthenticationSession
summary: Authenticate a user with a web service, even if the web service is run by a third party.

events.name: callback
events.summary: The callback which is called when the session is completed successfully or canceled by user.

properties.name: error
properties.summary: The error-message returned in case something went wrong.

properties.name: callbackURL
properties.summary: The callback-URL returned in case the OAuth-flow succeeded.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: If the view controller is already presented to load the webpage for authentication, it will be dismissed. Calling cancel on an already canceled session will have no effect.

methods.name: start
methods.summary: Starts the AuthenticationSession instance after it is instantiated.
methods.description: The start method can only be called once for an AuthenticationSession instance. This also means calling start on a canceled session will fail.

properties.name: scheme
properties.summary: The custom URL scheme that the app expects in the callback URL.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: The initial URL pointing to the authentication webpage. Only supports URLs with http:// or https:// schemes.
